review: I am the mother of Aditi Jain, who recently delivered a baby girl on 26th December in the hospital. She was under constant guidance of Dr.CS Mythreyi. I will call her as a great doctor, a great human being who puts in her bestest efforts to bring out the best in a patient. She is quite experienced, firm in her approach , an advent believer of God and makes the patient and their family comfortable and strong. Our entire family is extremely obliged to her for her zeal, dedication and her expertise in bringing smiles to infinite families. üôè- Meena Aggarwal

Dr CS Mythreyi has been of great help to us to sail through our pregnancy with ease and comfort despite we being under stress because of complications faced in previous pregnancy. She was confident of normal delivery (VBAC) even after our first child was born of caesarian for complications. She helped allay our anxiety as the D-Day was near and she did successfully conduct normal delivery this time. She has been such a blessing for us and would definitely recommend others to visit her.
